x4freetext: Compiler`s comment: Kaeppeler and Reifarth developed
corrections for the NNDC entry 14228 that was deleted
by Otuka as duplicate of 23095. The Karlsruhe group
original result was based on its own 197Au(n,gamma)
cross section by Ratynski and Kaeppeler, Phys.Rev. C37,
595 (1988), EXFOR entry #22099 for  neutron beam
monitor that later was  proven as deficient.
Kaeppeler and Reifarth comment: Cross
section value in entry 14228 is renormalized:
a) for new gold cross section
b) by an additional factor 1.5/2.6 = 0.577, which
accounts for the new weighted half-life of 2.60 (5) My
from G. Rugel, T. Faestermann, K. Knie et al.,
Phys. Rev. Lett. 103,(2009) 072502 and from A. Wallner,
M. Bichler, K. Buczak, R. Dressler, L.K. Fifield,
D. Schumann, J.H. Sterba, S. G. Tims, G. Wallner, and
W. Kutschera, Phys. Rev. Lett. 114 (2015) 041101
c) by an additional factor 22.2/21.4 = 1.037, which
accounts for the revised gamma-intensities for the
297.8 and 1205 keV transitions in the 61Fe-decay
(NDS/ENSDF 2020).
Compiled by S.H.
On. Deleted. Duplication of EXFOR 23095.
BP: Updated REFERENCE, added COMMENT.
